name: @oblivionocean/minigfm
description: Minimal JavaScript Markdown renderer with near-GFM compatibility.
author: OblivionOcean

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/index.cjs --source-map -c -m --timings --mangle-props reserved=[MiniGFM,parse,hljs],keep_quoted -o dist/index.min.js && cp src/index.cjs dist/index.cjs && cp src/index.mjs dist/index.mjs
